LocationSearch.summary: Check location parameter values for use in event or venue list by location requests.

name.description: The name of the location your searching for.

postcode.description: The postcode of the location your searching for.

geo.description: Comma separated latitude and longitude of the location your searching for.

radius_distance.description: The furthest distance from the given location that should be searched.

distance_unit.description: The unit of measurment that should be applied to the radius_distance value.

results_per_page.description: The number of results you want per page/chunk.

page.description: The page/chunk of results to be requested.

order_by.description: Order events by the named object property.

LocationWidget.summary: Return widget data for location based event listings.

location.description: The location of events you want a listing for. Values should be prefixed with the type of location data you are submitting [name:, postcode:, geo:]. NB: Values applied to this parameter with the name may be ambiguous E.G: Newcastle. Use location/search endpoint to find a unique location identifier (postcode or lat,lng) that matches the location you want.

radius_distance.description: The furthest distance from the location you want events listed for.

distance_unit.description: The unit of measurment that should be applied to the radius_distance value [mi, km].

genres.description: A serialised JSON array of genres you want events listed for.

encode.description: The character encoding for the data response.

results_per_page.description: The number of results you want per page/chunk [25, 50, 75, 100].

page.description: The page/chunk of results to be requested.
